reviewText: I am a big Tom Bianchi fan, and have the complete (I believe!) collection of his photobooks of male nudes. I purchased this DVD without hesitation. The DVD features several men of different looks/hair color, hairy/not hairy, etc. Each is handsome and fully exposes his body. Even Tom Bianchi pops up frontally nude a couple of times. This does not feature explicit sexual acts, so if you're looking for that, this will not deliver. If you enjoy seeing bare-balled men, this might fill the bill.
